results.content: {"results":[{"title":"Okta vs Microsoft Entra ID: Access Management Comparison","content":"Comparison of two leading IAM platforms: Okta excels in SSO across different apps and platforms, especially in non-Microsoft environments. Okta provides granular policy control with adaptive MFA and custom flows. Entra ID shines in Microsoft 365 ecosystems with tight integration and risk-based conditional access. Okta offers more flexibility for hybrid setups, while Entra ID provides bundled pricing with M365. Key differences: Okta charges per-feature, Entra ID often bundled with Microsoft products.","url":"https://www.linkedin.com/posts/a-abdelghafar_okta-entraid-accessmanagement-activity-7310002254479089664-JbTU"},{"title":"Top 11 Privileged Access Management Software Solutions in 2025","content":"Comprehensive PAM solutions comparison. Key features: PASM (privileged account and session management) includes SSO, MFA, password management. PEDM (privilege elevation and delegation management) enab
